name: graphql-deep-dedup
description: An Apollo Link library and test harness (GraphQL client and server) for GraphQL deduplication.

scripts.build: lerna run --scope apollo-link-deep-dedup build && lerna run --ignore apollo-link-deep-dedup build
scripts.prepush: test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" || (echo "Respository is dirty."; exit 1) && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.printDir: npm run clean && tree -v --charset utf-8 -I node_modules
